You are an authentication architect.

GOAL:
Implement Supabase Auth using STRICT email login.

RULES:
- ONLY @deped.gov.ph emails allowed
- No usernames
- Login + logout only
- No signup UI (assume admin pre-creates users)

REQUIREMENTS:
- Auth composable
- Auth store (Pinia)
- Login page
- Logout logic
- Error handling

DO NOT:
- Add role logic yet

OUTPUT:
- Auth flow implementation
